effect: As long as Darth Vader is in the Character arena, if this unit would be discarded from the Ground arena, retreat it and remove all damage counters from it instead.

name: Snowtrooper Guard
effect: Armor (This unit is hit only on a 5 or more.)

name: Snowtrooper Heavy Weapons Team
effect: Critical Hit 2 (This unit does 2 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)

name: Snowtrooper Squad
effect: Accuracy 1

name: Space Slug
effect:
When this unit damages another unit and the other unit is discarded, remove a number of damage counters from this unit equal to the other unit's build cost.
Armor (This unit is hit only on a 5 or more.)

name: Stormtrooper Sentry
effect:
If this card is in your discard pile and you deploy a Dark Jedi, you may return this card to your hand.
Armor (This unit is hit only on a 5 or more.)

name: Stormtrooper Swarm
effect: Pay 9 Force -> Each of your Stormtroopers gets +X power until end of turn, where X is the number of Stormtroopers in all arenas.

name: Strange Lodgings
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> Prevent 1 damage to one of your units.
Enhance: Pay 3 more Force -> Prevent 4 damage to that unit instead.

name: Streets of Cloud City
effect: Fight the Ground battle before the Space battle.

name: Surprise Reinforcements
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Your opponent gains 5 build points and may spend them as though it was his or her build step. Then you gain 5 build points and may do the same. Play only when no unit is attacking.

name: Swamps of Dagobah
effect: Each unit costs one more build counter to deploy.

name: Tauntaun
effect: Discard this unit from the Ground arena -> Prevent all damage to one of your Characters in the Character arena. Play only if that Character would be discarded from the Character arena.

name: Tauntaun Mount
effect: Tap -> One of your Rebel Characters gets +20 speed and +2 power until end of turn.

name: TIE Bomber EX-1-2
effect:
This unit gets Critical Hit 2 as long as it's using Bombard to attack a Ground unit.
Bombard 2

name: TIE Bomber EX-1-8
effect: Bombard 2 (This unit may attack a unit in the Ground arena instead of a unit in the Space arena using 2 power plus any other effects.)

name: TIE Bomber Pilot
effect: Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets +3 power as long as it's using Bombard to attack a Ground unit.

name: TIE Bomber Squad
effect:
As long as this unit is attacking a Capital Ship, it gets Critical Hit 2.
Tap -> This unit does 1 die of damage to each of your opponents units in the Ground arena.

name: TIE Fighter EX-4-9
effect: As long as you have an Imperial Capital Ship in the Space arena, this unit gets Accuracy 1.

name: TIE Fighter OS-72-8
effect: As long as you have an Imperial Capital Ship in the Space arena, this unit gets +1 power.

name: TIE Pursuit Pilot
effect: Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets "When this Starfighter is discarded from the Space arena, you gain 3 build points next turn."

name: TIE Pursuit Squad
effect:
This unit gets -1 power for each damage counter on it.
Critical Hit 2

name: Torture Room
effect: When the Character battle step starts, choose one of your opponent's units in the Character arena. Do 3 dice of damage to that Character.

name: Toryn Farr (A)
effect:
Toryn can't retreat during your retreat step.
Pay 1 Force -> One of your Rebel units gets +10 speed until end of turn. You may play this ability any number of times each turn.

name: Trust Her Instincts
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Prevent up to 4 damage to one of your units. Play only if you have a Creature in any arena.

name: Vader's Call
effect:
To complete Vader's Call, you may also pay any amount of Force.
Your opponent discards that many cards from his or her hand.

name: Vader's Imperial Shuttle (A)
effect: Tap -> Search your deck. You may take a Darth Vader card from your deck. Show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Play only during your build step.

name: Vader's Vengeance
effect: Pay any amount of Force -> One of your units in any arena gets that much power for this attack.

name: Vicious Attack
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> One of your Creatures gets +3 power for this attack.
Enhance: Pay 2 more Force -> That Creature gets +6 power for this attack instead.

name: Visions of the Future
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Prevent all damage one of your attacking units would do. Untap that unit.

name: Wampa
effect: This unit can't retreat, must attack, and can attack your units in the Ground arena.

name: Wampa Cave
effect: Each of your Creatures costs 1 less build counter to deploy.

name: Wedge Antilles (B)
effect:
Speeder Pilot. The Speeder gets:
* +20 speed.
* +2 power.
* Accuracy 1
* When this Speeder would be damaged, prevent 2 of that damage.

name: Wedge's Snowspeeder (A)
effect: When Wedge's Snowspeeder damages another unit, until end of turn, each of your other units in the Ground arena gets Accuracy 3 as long as they're attacking that unit.

name: Well-Earned Meal
effect: This turn, whenever any of your opponent's units is discarded from any arena or his or her build zone, you gain Force equal to that unit's build cost.

name: X-wing Rogue Seven
effect: Critical Hit 1 (This unit does 1 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)

name: Y-wing Gold Six
effect: Armor (This unit is hit only on a 5 or more.)

effect:
Tap -> A Battle card disrupt (no effect, that card has), unless 2 Force your opponent pays.

name: Yoda (G)
effect: Under any Jedi Padawan, Yoda stack you can. On top of that stack, Yoda can't be. 1 extra card in it, the stack can have.

name: Yoda (H)
effect:
Whenever damage to one of your units you prevent, 1 Force you gain.
3 Force pay -> Evade 2

name: Yoda's Hut
effect: When the roll for build points is made, each player gains +1 build point for each Jedi Character he or she has in any arena.

name: Yoda's Training
effect: Choose one of your Jedi Characters in any arena. Search your deck. You may take up to 3 cards with the same name as that Character from your deck and stack them under the Character. (Follow normal stacking rules.) Then shuffle your deck.

name: Zev Senesca (A)
effect:
Pay 3 Force -> Return a Character card from your discard pile to your hand. Play only if no unit is attacking.
Speeder Pilot. The Speeder gets +10 speed.
